Curse of Blinding Radiance.name: Curse of Blinding Radiance
Curse of Blinding Radiance.fullText:
Valiant Hexblade Attack 11Curse of Blinding Radiance

White light blazes from you, stealing your foe’s vision and giving you new power with which you bring this contest to a close.

Encounter        Arcane, Implement, Radiant
Standard Action      Ranged 5

Target: One enemy

Attack: Charisma vs. Fortitude

Hit: 2d6 + Charisma modifier radiant damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

Effect: Until the end of your next turn, your attacks against the target deal 5 extra radiant damage.


Published in Dragon Magazine 393.
Curse of Blinding Radiance.flavor: White light blazes from you, stealing your foe’s vision and giving you new power with which you bring this contest to a close.

Ranged 5

Target: One enemy

Attack: Charisma vs. Fortitude

Effect: Until the end of your next turn, your attacks against the target deal 5 extra radiant damage.

White Well Invocation.name: White Well Invocation
White Well Invocation.fullText:
Valiant Hexblade Utility 12White Well Invocation

The White Well’s magic transforms you into pure moonlight, enabling you to move with supernatural speed. The grief carried by the magic, though, can overwhelm you.

Daily        Arcane, Aura, Teleportation
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You activate an aura 1 that lasts until the end of the encounter. The aura is filled with bright light. Whenever you take damage while the aura is active, roll a d20. On a 10 or higher, you can teleport up to 5 squares after taking the damage and become insubstantial until the start of your next turn. On a 1or 2, you are dazed until the start of your next turn. Otherwise, nothing happens.


Published in Dragon Magazine 393.
White Well Invocation.flavor: The White Well’s magic transforms you into pure moonlight, enabling you to move with supernatural speed. The grief carried by the magic, though, can overwhelm you.

Otherwise, nothing happens.

White Well Transformation.name: White Well Transformation
White Well Transformation.fullText:
Valiant Hexblade Utility 20White Well Transformation

The White Well’s magic flows through you, transforming you into a radiant champion. Your foes recoil in fear from your brilliant aspect.

Daily        Arcane, Teleportation
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +2 power bonus to Reflex, Will, and speed, and you can use the secondary power once per round.


White Well Transformation Secondary Power

Daily      Arcane, Fear, Implement, Radiant
Minor Action      Melee 1

Requirement: The power White Well Transformation must be active in order to use this power.

Target: One creature

Attack: Charisma vs. Will

Hit: 10 radiant damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 393.
White Well Transformation.flavor: The White Well’s magic flows through you, transforming you into a radiant champion. Your foes recoil in fear from your brilliant aspect.

Personal
